member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1
member.summary: An RadioFM1 module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.INVALID_CHANNEL
member.summary: The channel returned by when no Channel is found.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.MIN_VOLUME
member.summary: The minimum volume the device can output.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.MAX_VOLUME
member.summary: The maximum volume the device can output.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance.
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.Seek(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.SeekDirection)
member.summary: Tells the radio to Seek in the given direction until it finds a station.
member.param: The direction to Seek the radio.
member.remarks: It does wrap around when seeking.
member.returns: The Channel that was tuned to or if no Channel was found.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.IncreaseVolume
member.summary: Increases the Volume by one.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.DecreaseVolume
member.summary: Decreases the Volume by one.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.SetChannelConfiguration(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.Spacing,Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.Band)
member.summary: Sets the channel spacing and band of the device.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.RadioTextChanged
member.summary: Raised when new Radio Text is available.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.Volume
member.summary: Gets or sets the Volume of the radio.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.MaxChannel
member.summary: The maximum channel the radio and be tuned to.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.MinChannel
member.summary: The minimum channel the radio and be tuned to.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.Channel
member.summary: Gets or sets the Channel of the radio.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.RadioText
member.summary: Gets the current Radio Text.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.RadioTextChangedHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate that is used to handle the event.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.SeekDirection
member.summary: The enumeration that determines which direction to Seek when calling Seek(direction);

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.SeekDirection.Forward
member.summary: Seeks for a higher station number.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.SeekDirection.Backward
member.summary: Seeks for a lower station number.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.Band
member.summary: The radio frequency band.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.Band.USAEurope
member.summary: The band used in the United States and Europe (87.5-108MHz).

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.Band.JapanWide
member.summary: The wide band used in the Japan (76-108MHz).

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.Band.Japan
member.summary: The band used in Japan (76-90MHz).

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.Spacing
member.summary: The radio channel spacing.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.Spacing.USAAustrailia
member.summary: Spacing in USA and Austrailia (200KHz).

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RadioFM1.Spacing.EuropeJapan
member.summary: Spacing in Europe and Japan (100KHz).
